website_summaries.verdict: Nursing cover that has multiple uses due to its stretchy material.
pros: Can be used as a nursing cover, car seat cover, and shopping cart cover
Made of a Spandex polyester mix so it's soft and stretchy
cons: Can be a little too tight fitting at the top when using as a nursing cover

customer_reviews.title: This product comes in a nice little dust bag made of the same fabric
customer_reviews.text: This product comes in a nice little dust bag made of the same fabric. Very cute pattern, had a nice soft Silk feel to it. Compared to its competitors it holds up very well! I really got this to protect my baby from outside elements and from strangers trying to touch her and it definitely does its job! I did take away one star because I felt like there was a little to much fabric at the bottom, it sometimes hangs over and gets in the way when trying to click in my Greco car seat into the stroller. I do understand this is made to be universal for all car seats & breastfeeding moms. Hope this was helpful!
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: I am plus size and can comfortably wear this as a breast feeding cover as well
customer_reviews.text: This is really soft and breathable. I am plus size and can comfortably wear this as a breast feeding cover as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Anhalt

customer_reviews.title: Looks like pic, does not fit like pic.
customer_reviews.text: Very excited to get this in for the new baby. Very cute pattern, looks just like the image. While the quality is really good, it is too large for the car seat. I have a Graco Click connect and the cover didn't fit like the picture, so the fabric is all in my baby's face. The cut at the top where the handle goes through is too large causing it to sag down. I've had this for 6 months now and have only used it ,3 or 4 times. I just started using a blanket instead.
customer_reviews.author: HortonTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but stretches too easily
customer_reviews.text: This cover is lightweight and pretty thin, which is exactly what I wanted for my spring/summer new baby. The only downside seems to be the fact that it stretches too easily when taking the cover on and off the car seat multiple times. When it stretches out, it hangs too far down the handle and in my baby's face. I have to wash and dry it a little more often than I'd like to, in order to tighten the fabric back up. Overall tho, that issue will not stop me from using. It's also a very cute print and great price!
customer_reviews.author: K Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and Quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this only as a car seat canopy. It is very soft, stretches nice, washes nice, and I get compliments on it all the time. It is not super breathable, so I would definitely be careful with using it on a warm day and making sure your baby gets plenty of fresh air. I mainly use it to keep people from reaching in or touching the baby when I take him to doctor’s appointments. Price tip - this was one of the least expensive covers I found that had good reviews. Based on the quality I’ve experienced it is definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Whtbat

customer_reviews.title: Soft material
customer_reviews.text: I hate how bad the lighting is in my living rooms the photos don’t do this product justice. The fabric is made from a soft silky material. I myself am not an extremely large person but I’m not small either. This covers me just fine. I’ve already had people ask me where I bought it. It comes in a zip lock bag and has its own bag for storing purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Chris&kayla

customer_reviews.title: Good for breastfeeding
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for breastfeeding in public. It works great. I pull it down around the boppy pillow so I dont have to hold it while baby nurses. The only thing is that creates the ultimate body heat and it get super hot inside there. So I point a small fan from the floor up to get some circulation for the baby. It's not see through so you can use it anywhere, I personally wouldn't put it over the carseat just cause I'm paranoid about baby getting fresh air circulation, I havent tried it. I wouldn't let baby sleep in my little contraption unless the fan is blowing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Burnham United Federation of Planets

customer_reviews.title: I love this for my little one
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my little one! She's always hot, and this breathes so well. My husband is a mechanic, so he gets his dirty hand prints on it occasionally, but they wash right out!
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this car seat cover Too small to use for breast feeding cover but I’ve used it for everything else lol works great for spit up or to put them on your car seat while changing. Very durable holds up to many washings Not too hot but wouldn’t use for warmer climates (we live in the south but use only in the a/c in the car or from car to building) Fits both of my sons graco & babytrend car seats Would definitely buy this cover again
customer_reviews.author: MrsW

customer_reviews.title: Use it for as a shield for pumping milk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a shield for use while driving and in public - I pump milk - and this works great for that purpose. Soft and stretchy, and looks worth more (the feather design is super cute). It is pretty long, and provides both privacy and coverage. I am even able to duck my whole head through the opening when I need to put on my hands-free pumping bra or adjust the bottle flanges while on the move.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: ... as a cute infinity scarf and just put my sweet pea under when she was hungry
customer_reviews.text: Wore this as a cute infinity scarf and just put my sweet pea under when she was hungry. Incredibly soft and breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Brittanie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this multi use wrap. I have only used it thus far for nursing and the car seat cover. But it’s super silly, and very breathable while nursing. It does have a little weight to it, but not at al super thick or heavy. The design is super cute in person, defiantly buying more!! 🙂🙂
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Simpkins

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a car seat cover only. It is pretty, but it’s not the fastest car seat cover to use, the fabric gets in the way of the car seat base so you can’t leave it on the car seat in the car, and the hold where the car seat handle goes is very large, so not the most ideal for winter It’s cute and soft though and works if you don’t mind the slight hassles of it.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: This nursing cover is wonderful! Holds up great
customer_reviews.text: This nursing cover is wonderful! Holds up great, fabric is super soft! Love that it comes with a bag to keep it in. Haven't used it as a car seat cover, but I'm sure it would work just great for that. I love that while using it for nursing, it covers my whole body (including my back, unlike traditional covers). Not see through at all, pretty thick material. Would highly recommend! Great deal, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Not great for nursing.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful print. Super soft fabric. Not a great design for nursing. Thai was the primRy reason I bought it and the shape is just off. I’m not a big person, and it is snuuuuuug on me. I wear a six, so if you are any bigger I definitely don’t recommend this for nursing. Probably works great for a car seat cover or high chair cover but I haven’t tried it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Erin J Waters

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover! The pattern and colors are so cute, I’m always getting asked where I got it. And I love the versatility!! It’s very lightweight and breathable So I don’t worry about it getting too hot for baby under there.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for feeding
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for car seat and chairs. For nursing it’s all covered that baby gets hot after a couple minutes because of body heat. Baby was fussy when I tried couple of times. So using it only for car seat in cold weathers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever!
customer_reviews.text: Cute soft and easy! Stretch and breathable. We used it at the zoo and it was perfect. Usually my Lo doesn't want to be covered but this sisnt bother her at all. It's cute too. Might get another design too. Plus it can be used for ao many thi gs it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Darling-Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Just received and pleased with what I got. Currently 36 weeks pregnant and I could fit it on me and looks like room for baby as well for breastfeeding (I'm not super small usually a L/LX pre-pregnancy) very pretty design and nice bag to help keep track of it. Once baby is here we will try out for breastfeeding, if it doesn't work for that for whatever reason still plenty of other uses. Seems stretchy and breathable semi see through when stretched in some areas but nothing major. Still seems to give privacy. Happy with the purchase may get another in a different design if it works out for the baby and I.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Couturier

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended car seat cover
customer_reviews.text: The most favorite car seat cover out of all of them I have purchased. I absolutely love this car seat cover and I recommend it for all newborn babies. It is sturdy and it fits the car seat very well. I also love that it has a window that you can cover at the top by the handle you can also look at the baby check on the baby without exposing to all the wind rain Etc.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Soft fabric!
customer_reviews.text: Soft fabric. I disliked that when being used as an infant car seat cover there was no easy way to access baby. I did not use it as a nursing cover but I can see it prob would have worked well. The fabric is soft and held up after washing. It was nice that it had a storage bag with it too.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great fabric quality
customer_reviews.text: We love this car seat cover. So easy to put on/off. Super stretchy material. Perfect for hot desert weather. I have also used it as nursing cover. I have recommended to my sister in le and my friends with new babies
customer_reviews.author: Jess G.

customer_reviews.title: Must have nursing cover!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item as a gift for my sister. I purchased one for her after I purchased one for myself and absolutely loved it it's a must-have. Best nursing cover ever. I wish I had it for my other three children
customer_reviews.author: kristi schneider

customer_reviews.title: Multi use for car seat and breastfeeding
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. It’s great for the carriage and good to have when feeding the baby. I had a few people asked me where I got it. It covers great for the sun but not too dark. However living in Texas it does get a little hot when trying to cover the baby. The material is smooth and feels light but won’t be comfortable for someone of large size for breast feeding.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Garza

customer_reviews.title: Not for very tall baby
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice nursing cover, light and breathable. But since my baby is tall, sometimes I have difficulty to fit my baby in there for nursing. It comes with a travel-friendly small pouch which is really nice. It also works as car seat cover.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie P.

customer_reviews.title: Big and Breathable
customer_reviews.text: I am 37 weeks pregnant. 5’9 275lb. Plenty of room for breast feeding. I get hot easily to the point where I sleep in front of the AC blowing high cold at 72 without a blanket. Product was breathable and I could feel the airflow from the AC across the room. Will buy more products from them.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Best Car seat & BF Cover
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could’ve found something like this when I had my first daughter, it would’ve made covering up when breastfeeding so much easier! I’m due in October but I’ve tried this on to see how it works and I can tell it’s going to work wonderfully for breastfeeding plus I love that it fits perfectly on the car seat as well and covers it all the way around with the hole for the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan & Lynds

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and turned out my babylike this one too, when she is inside ,she likes to reach out to the colorful feathers ,enjoy her time inside the carseat.which is a big help for first time mom.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and so soft!
customer_reviews.text: I really like it, the colors are vibrant and beautiful, I have had lots of compliments it, I have not used it for breastfeeding because I sweat with just a light muslin blanket, it is a little heavier than one of those, but I'm looking forward to using it in cooler weather!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best new item for babies and mom.
customer_reviews.text: The car seat canopy is just what our gift recipient needed. The colors are exactly as they appear on the website, and it can be easily used as a feeding cover.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: So handy to have in my diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: With the pandemic happening right now, I love knowing I can easily store this in my bag and pull out if needed when going into a public place. Easy to put onto her seat and very breathable and light weight. I would recommend this for everyone, as it is a great thing to protect them from the sunshine as well.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and cute cover
customer_reviews.text: This is so pretty and even better than expected. The material is silky and it is so breathable. It doesn't get super hot underneath like other covers. It seemed like it would be see through, but it is not. It also comes in a cute matching carrying bag. I highly reccomend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori W

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: So lightweight-neither of us sweat! Not see-through at all! Doesn’t show any skin when breastfeeding! ITS SOOO SOFT
customer_reviews.author: MamaS

customer_reviews.title: very stretchy
customer_reviews.text: Much softer than I expected! Fits perfectly over our Baby Trend car seat. I'm not sure I will use it as a nursing cover, as I own others, but for a car seat cover it is perfect! Very stretchy, soft, and breathable
customer_reviews.author: Jessica K.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Print
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and granddaughter so she would have an extra one to cover the baby in this time of corona virus. It is a beautiful pattern with vibrant colors and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Lee A

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item. Light and flexible. Super breathable and has held up to use very well.
customer_reviews.text: Great item! Very nice soft yet sturdy material that breathes very well. Super stretchy and light but still looks new after 9 months of solid use now. It softens and dulls harsh sunlight, but still let’s plenty in so baby isn’t in the dark. This has turned out to be an excellent purchase for our little one and we never leave home without it.
customer_reviews.author: Chevy0846810

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great product.
customer_reviews.text: Price is excellent. Fabric is not the most breathable but I love the print and design. This would cost $30 in store. thanks! I have not used it as a nursing cover yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Our fav blanket!
customer_reviews.text: Love our cover! Super easy to use and so thankful it doubles as a car seat cover, this is the only breastfeeding cover I don’t forget because it’s already attached! Bonus: super easy to swaddle babies in!
customer_reviews.author: Harlee Young

customer_reviews.title: So many uses!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this everytime i left the house, as a cover for the carseat, a nursing cover multiple times, i also got so many compliments on how cute it is and asking where i got it. I do still use it as a carseat cover since im not nursing have also wore it as a scarf as well which i enjoyed and loved!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha B

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover. We use it for nursing and over her car seat to protect against wind, rain and snow. I also wear it as a scarf when not nursing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and spacious.
customer_reviews.text: It’s great, it gets a little hot feeding the little one. The opening is a little wonky kinda hard to see what’s going on, it takes a minute to adjust to using it. I’m still learning how to get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Francheska

customer_reviews.title: Kinda small
customer_reviews.text: I think this is super cute and live the pattern. The material is really soft but overall it's small. I'm 5'8-5'9 a L/XL size 14 and don't think I'll be able to utilize this as a nursing cover. Most likely I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacobs Family

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and stretchy
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and easy to roll up small enough to fit in my small purse if we don’t want the full diaper bag. Also we can just put it over baby and use as a blanket. I use it as a breastfeeding cover. The only thing is that baby is sweating by the time she is done eating. Not very breathable, but I don’t have a solution to that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lightweight cover
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is a new mom must have. This is really cute and durable. I have used it as both a nursing cover and carseat cover so far, and I love it. We get so many compliments on it. The fabric is very stretchy, without being see through. I will be buying these for ever baby shower I am invited to!
customer_reviews.author: cortney

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really can't wait to use it. Will definitely serve its purpose. I love the vibrant colors. It's breathable and will be used during the spring, summer and early fall seasons as a carseat canopy. But i will enjoy using it as a breast feeding cover. I'm curious to use it as a shopping cart cover. The pattern is beautiful. I just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I used this a lot during the summertime when I’d need to cover up on hikes or outings. I feel like it never got super hot, and it was very easy to cover up.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: New mom recommended, best for breastfeeding
customer_reviews.text: I love this and my baby loves it too. She gets hot quickly and the whole cover thing is not her favorite. But with this she's not as hot because it's made out of a cooler material and not irritable. Very cute style color as well and the material is strechy in a good way. If it's ever too loose you just wash it with hot water and put it in the dryer and it goes right back to size.
customer_reviews.author: tia

customer_reviews.title: Love it, just wish the material was more breathable
customer_reviews.text: Pros: tapered at the top so it stays up easy, super soft material, easy to carry around, super cute. Con: not breathable so gets hot I love this! Just wish it was more breathable bc I won’t be able to use this much longer. Spring and summer here are way too hot.
customer_reviews.author: TXShell

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and comfortable, easily my favorite purchase since having my 5 month old. The full coverage as a nursing cover is great, because unlike other covers, my back is also covered. Really really soft! We live in a really hot, humid place, so the breathability of the fabric could be a tiny bit better, but overall, I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel K

customer_reviews.title: Love this product as Car Seat cover.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this as a car seat cover and keep getting lots of compliments. It keeps the weather off my baby. Sun off her in car. I can lower one side and raise the other for my older son to see her in back of car and also keep sun off her. Also great to keep her hidden from people/germs when going out during the 1st month home from hospital.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: This cover is wonderful. I use it on my daughters car seat ...
customer_reviews.text: This cover is wonderful. I use it on my daughters car seat and as a nursing cover. As a car seat cover I like that it blocks the sun out, doesn’t help too much with the wind entering, but that isn’t a big deal to me. As far as nursing.. It’s more of a lightweight material, which I love because it doesn’t get hot. I also like the fact that I don’t have to worry about it flying up when it’s windy or falling down. Plus, I get compliments on how neat it is!
customer_reviews.author: SACRAIG2007

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Purchase for a Gift
customer_reviews.text: The new mom was thrilled. She loved this. This was part of a gift tote for a first time mom. The baby's room was done in feathers. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alan's Girl

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: Material is super soft! I purchased this for carseat cover/breastfeeding. I haven't used it yet so I have yet to figure our how it will fit. But I can definitely speak for the material type.
customer_reviews.author: Jenniffer

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is amazing! For both the car seat and nursing. I got to use it yesterday walking in the cities for the car seat and it kept the wind and sun away perfectly. And even as a bigger woman, size 2x, the cover was perfect for nursing and fully covers me. Very satisfied with my purchase not to mention this is half the price than other covers on Amazon! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Buttery soft, great coloring!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this! Didnt think I would like it as much as I do, I haven't needed to use it yet as I'm still pregnant but as soon as I opened it it was buttery soft and had amazing stretch so any of the 4 purposes will definitely be suitable. Great material and amazing coloring!
customer_reviews.author: chelsea1483

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it since our LO is born. Love the bright color and pattern. Sending out positive vibe. Have been using on car seat and for breastfeeding cover as well. Both works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Breathe Well
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful, soft, well constructed, and came in a matching drawstring pouch BUT I never use it as a nursing cover because it gets too hot for baby and there is no fresh air flow while he's nursing. 4 stars because it is as advertised, just didn't realize the material, though thin, would make it useless as a nursing cover.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia S.

customer_reviews.title: Not functional.
customer_reviews.text: Cute but pointless. I wish it had a slit or a zipper but it's so tight once on,it's on, it just gave it away. It's not functional.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Muldoon

customer_reviews.title: Decent car seat cover.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent. I use this when we’re out and about to cover the car seat so people don’t touch the baby. Haven’t used it as a breastfeeding cover, I just use a receiving blanket for that.
customer_reviews.author: Bee the Yogi

customer_reviews.title: Not so breathable, but cute and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Love this ...however it does get stuffy for baby, I dont feel like it's that breathable she gets super hot like sweating if I'm nursing outside on a warm day. Other than that it's great!
customer_reviews.author: jaci Greenwell

customer_reviews.title: Too small!
customer_reviews.text: Too small. I wear medium/large in shirts. This was too tight for myself without putting my baby in. I couldn't see my baby
customer_reviews.author: sandybeachh

customer_reviews.title: Just as described!
customer_reviews.text: It is very pretty and super soft. It looks exactly as pictured & has a little pouch to store. Cant Wait to use it when my baby arrives!
customer_reviews.author: AF2019

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for customer service alone! The first one I received was so soft and beautiful minus a stain on one side of it. I reached out to customer service and they immediately sent me a new one without even questioning me or hesitating. The second arrived in perfect condition and so quickly! I gave this as a gift so I can't speak for breathability/etc, but the receiver loved the look/feel/pattern when she opened it!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: So cute and doubled as a nursing cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover was the cutest thing I purchased for my twins. I bought two different ones. One for a girl and one for a boy. I used them as a nursing cover when breastfeeding and it worked awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Belk

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I know it's called silky baby car seat cover but I was expecting more of a spandex type feel. But this cover really is super silky! It stretches well and even comes with a matching draw string storage bag! Vibrant colors! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: T.Moudry

customer_reviews.title: I bought a second one..
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this when I had my baby in June. I thought I lost it so I bought another one. I did end finding the "lost" one so I returned the second one I bought. It looks just like the picture. I've used it to cover the carseat, for breastfeeding, to cover a shopping cart, and to cover a highchair. It's lightweight, but great material, and looks just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: This is not a nursing cover, purchase it for different purposes
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is so thick and it was to tight. Tried it once qnd my baby was sweating qnd crying. This product should not be advertised as a nursing cover. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Isimsz

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute pattern, seems to wash well so far. I’m not sure how the white will stay clean looking for very long but I do like the cut of the fabric to fit the car seat handle well. Seems to be lightweight for summer as well
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Honestly only ordered this so I would qualify for the Welcome Baby Box amazon offers through their baby registry. But I’m pleasantly surprised by this product, the pattern is even prettier than the pictures, it’s super soft and I’m so excited to use it with my baby girl!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cover!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 month old would kick or grab my old nursing cover and uncover me. I ordered this hoping it’d contain my playful little guy. It’s a light stretching material that he pokes, kicks, and grabs at but it keeps me covered and the material is light so he doesn’t get hot. I love how it lo Is too. Super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is great!! Very lightweight so I know she can breathe just fine when it's surrounding her car seat. I'm super cute and trendy
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ammons

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for hot weather, but super soft fabric
customer_reviews.text: Does what it claims, and the fabric is super soft. That being said, the fabric doesn't breathe well, and that's difficult in the southern US heat. Additionally, it can be problematic when trying to quickly pop the car seat in and out of the base.
customer_reviews.author: Burkel

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: Perfect nursing cover! SUPER soft and can be used for many things, nursing/blanket/shopping cart cover/etc. bought a second one too
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Pecoraro

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not breathable
customer_reviews.text: These aren’t really that breathable so I won’t be using it when we go to Texas... but it’s super soft and works well for people who live on the north
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a car seat cover!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Super cute and stretchy. It’s a little large so the only thing I don’t like about it is if it’s too far down on the car seat and I put the seat in the base then want to check on the baby during a car ride it sometimes gets stuck under the car seat because it’s so large.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It feels just like lularoe material and it’s super versatile. I’ve only used it as a car seat cover and breast feeding cover so far but it worked fantastic for both of those things.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and practical.
customer_reviews.text: Love this item, very good quality, beautiful and easy to use. Perfect for summer too. Very stretchy. I’ve definitely been using it.
customer_reviews.author: D.E. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for low price
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loves this cover. I get compliments everywhere we go with it. It's light weight machine washable. You can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nebelung

customer_reviews.title: My favorite baby item!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it as a car seat cover and nursing cover. Super stretching, very lightweight and breathable! And super cute design. Sooo many people asked where i got it.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Renee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect buy
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this cover. I've had people stare at the car seat like I must be crazy; but I would much rather my infant be protected from and germs. Its multi use is also fabulous!!
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice thick cover helps keep the sun off the baby and people won’t bother her nearly as much. We use this daily! I have gone with the “free” one from Facebook before and this is a way better product!
customer_reviews.author: lindseylillian

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE MATERIAL!
customer_reviews.text: This material is so incredibly soft... I love it! I get compliments on the pattern all the time. I love how it can be used for a nursing cover! I have no used it on shopping carts or highchair yet but I will! I have yet to put it through the wash though.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla R.

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I love that it had multiple purposes and that the fabric was so soft and stretchy. The design is also beautiful. Definitely something I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: This fits the carseat great! It's a little awkward to use as a ...
customer_reviews.text: This fits the carseat great! It's a little awkward to use as a nursing cover as it is tight and not exactly the fit I was going for breastfeeding but like I said it fits the carseat great! Plus the pattern is great and the fabric is so soft!
customer_reviews.author: KBee

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover. I wish it was easier to see my baby to help him latch on. Otherwise this is a lovely cover. The fabric is soft and easy to clean. I've washed it several times and it still looks just as nice as the day I opened it.
customer_reviews.author: r.case

customer_reviews.title: Multi-functional and great value
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! The material is very soft and I like the cute design. As a mom of 3, I like the fact that it has multiple uses and is also compact. So far I have used it as a car seat cover, a nursing cover, and a blanket for my baby. Great value - I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kfaulkenham

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Really cute print and vibrant colors. Not very breatheable as a nursing cover but that is a bonus as a car seat cover. Still works as a nursing cover in a pinch. The stretchy fabric is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: Economical
customer_reviews.text: Easy to wash and use and has a super breathable material while keeping the wind off. The price was also amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Sheveen Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great product and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Love all the ways it can be used best car seat cover I’ve had and love it as a nursing cover as well stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!! The material is so soft and the colors are vibrant and beautiful. It fits perfectly over our car seat and keeps my baby covered when we are out and about. I wish I had one when I had my first child.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So convenient
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest carseat cover I have ever used. It is easy to put on, stays put, and easy to wash. It can also be a nursing cover, which is awesome too.
customer_reviews.author: Staci Galey

customer_reviews.title: Adorable cover
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I just use it as a car seat cover and it’s perfect. It’s too elasticy for a nursing cover for me. The print is adorable and it’s a light, stretchy fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: So pretty and soft.
customer_reviews.text: This is SO soft! I love the pattern too. Fits perfectly over my chicco keyfit 30 car seat. Holds up in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: HC Ardziv

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Perfect for both the car seat and during feedings. Added bonus to breathable is that it's super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Beth K

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this canopy, stretchy and large enough to completely cover her carseat! And lightweight enough to give her air! Definitely a good nursing cover, which I haven't had to use as yet but I definitely would! 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love this cover!
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a car seat cover for my newborn. I’ve gotten tons of compliments on it. It’s lightweight & the pattern is super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi LeeAnne

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, better price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this nursing cover! I have a more expensive brand as well and this wrap was half the price and just as good as quality. This is a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenna

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these gave this one as a gift cuz everyone should have one!
customer_reviews.author: stylistS

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It’s thick enough so you can’t see through it when used as a breastfeeding cover and awesome when used as a car seat cover
customer_reviews.author: pandalover

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is a way softer and too good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rinks

product_meta.title: Hicoco Nursing Cover Carseat Canopy - Baby Breastfeeding Cover, Car Seat Covers for Babies, Multi Use Nursing Scarf, Infant Stroller Cover, Boys and Girls Shower Gifts (Feather)
feature_bullets: Multi-use covers for new mothers – nursing cover, breastfeeding covers, carseat canopy, baby car seat cover, stroller sun protection covers, shopping cart cover, feeding chair cover, carrier sunshade, car seat covers for babies, even a infinity nursing scarf.

360° full coverage – If you need to breastfeeding your baby when in public, how do ? Now just take 5 seconds to wear our nursing cover, everything is so simple! Infinity tubular shape, super high stretchy & breathable fabric, provides full privacy coverage, enough space while mothers feeding baby.

Easy to use - No any straps or fasteners involved, when you need to use as a nursing covers or a car seat canopy, steps just like wear a t-shirt. Top 12.7 inches opening, allows you can see your baby while breastfeeding or baby sleeping in the car seat. EACH ORDER ATTACHED A FREE CARRY BAG, FOR YOU STOREGE THIS COVER OR OTHER BABY PRODUCT.

Full protection for your baby – Provide a cozy, breathable environment while your baby sleeping in the stroller or carseat ( sunshade & blackout blind ). Protects from summer heat & sunlight, onlooking strangers, dust and dirt, Bug and potential germs, wind.
Practical baby shower gifts –Great for boys and girls, cute pattern, brand bag packaging, multipurpose. Absolute practical gifts for baby shower party, new mothers.

specifications.Safety warning: To ensure safety, do not leave infant unattended while covered. As this may lead to suffocation or strangulation. Plastic bags and films can be dangerous, to avoid suffocation, keep this bag or film away from pets, babies and children.
specifications.Best uses: Baby car seat cover, nursing cover
